casebody.data:
In re: J.A.M. 7P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2017 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Jasmine. Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith Smith, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Caroline P. Mackie, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for GAL. Jacob E. Setzer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Moses, Travis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of January 2017 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of January 2017."
